message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price, considering its worth to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. However, I am only able to pay up to $12,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your valuation.
Bob, I understand your position, but $12,000 is significantly below its value. I could meet you halfway at $13,000. This is my final offer.
Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand your position, but unfortunately, I am still unable to meet you at $13,000. I would like to propose $12,500 as my final offer.
